reviewText:
A greater actor than Donald Southerland you will not find. he's witty and never fails to bring his character to the head of the
class. he always makes the movie a step higher if you like Donald southerland you'll love this movie

Awesome Donald Sutherland great as always.
love the storyline specially for 1976, and Broke Adams is beautiful, is a must have and see.

This is one of two bank robbery movies that Donald Sutherland has done. It's a fairly interesting movie that is humorous at times and serious the next. The main interest in this movie is how the bank was cased and the robbery was carried out. A good watch if you have an interest in bank robbery movies.
